site_name: Garages to the West of Donegal House, Buckhurst Street, London E1
description: Application for non-material amendment of planning permission ref: PA/22/00250 dated 21/12/2015 'Demolition of existing garages and the construction of six new, 2 and 3 storey, high quality, 4-bed terraced town houses with landscaped front and rear gardens and inset roof terraces' for the following changes:Internal layouts updated / entrance door flipped / additional storage added  Large openings at rear gardens / terraces split with recessed brickwork Large window to front elevation reduced in size Timber within entrance arch replaced with brick to match the rest of the facade Metal copings added to masonry parapetsInternal rainwater pipes to rear elevation replaced with external rainwater pipes Windows on north elevation replaced with recessed brickwork  Roof gradient reduced Bin store door replaced with a steel louvered panel door and frame. Removal of Condition 23 (PV array)
